casebody.data:
EASTERN BUILDING CORPORATION v. THE UNITED STATES [Nos. 45222 and 45269]

[Ante, pp. 399, 438; 317 U. S. —]

Lease of post office premises; cancelation under the Act of March 8, 1885; retroactive effect of repealing statute.

Decided April 6, 1942; plaintiff’s petitions dismissed.

Plaintiff’s petitions for writs of certiorari denied by the Supreme Court October 12, 1942.
